Articles.Content:
So basically i would really like to see the Kerbin mapping being changed to the Strangereal map of Ace Combat. I'm a long time Ace combat fan but i cannot figure out myself how to make the map (terrible at coding and modding). I provide the flat map i could recreate using photoshop here. If anyone could make this a real thing i would be really happy (and much Ace Combat fans too). 

so far my request, hope someone could help me out with this

 

Edited August 2, 2020 by BlackGhost070

1 hour ago, BlackGhost070 said:

So basically i would really like to see the Kerbin mapping being changed to the Strangereal map of Ace Combat. I'm a long time Ace combat fan but i cannot figure out myself how to make the map (terrible at coding and modding). I provide the flat map i could recreate using photoshop here. If anyone could make this a real thing i would be really happy (and much Ace Combat fans too). 

so far my request, hope someone could help me out with this

 

Your image is broken for me, but I would advise you to check out the Kopernicus mod thread and discord channel to learn how to swap height maps.
